metadata.readme_excerpt:
# BrowserStack MCP Server

Comprehensive Test Platform

Manage test cases, execute manual or automated tests, debug issues, and even fix code—directly within tools like Cursor, Claude, or any MCP-enabled client, using plain English. #### Test from anywhere: Easily connect the BrowserStack Test Platform to your favourite AI tools, such as IDEs, LLMs, or agentic workflows. #### Test with natural language: Manage, execute, debug tests, and even fix code using plain English prompts. #### Reduced context switching: Stay in flow—keep all project context in one place and trigger actions directly from your IDE or LLM. ## ⚡️ One Click MCP Setup Click on the buttons below to install MCP in your respe
